title: Just in case no-one noticed...
body:
Riven is op.

but seriously 4 of the 5 champions receiving project skins next patch are free this week, which is pretty cool.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=hELOYVWB,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-01T09:37:53.168+0000)
> but seriously 4 of the 5 champions receiving project skins next patch are free this week, which is pretty cool.

GUYS.

You say Riven is OP, top lane Garen I have not yet lost to a Riven.

GO FIGURE!

OK, so Garen is OP himself, but with champions like Riven, Garen and so on, they are one trick ponies, easy to beat most, maybe not Garen since he can just sit back and use his healing potion passive.

Just incase you didnt notice.

Oh no don't worry man, I definitely fucking noticed.
